src:
Galeri Foto
Lucu hingga Artsy, Seoul Punya Banyak Kafe yang Wajib Didatangi
05 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Instagram - detikFood
Jakarta - Di Seoul banyak sekali kafe yang wajib didatangi karena memiliki tema yang beragam mulai dari lucu menggemaskan hingga kafe yang bertema artsy.


Foto: Instagram @pinkpoolcafe1. Kafe ini sangat populer karena merupakan bagian dari butik Style Nanda, memiliki konsep dengan tema area kolam renang kafe lucu ini sangat cantik dan instagenik dengan dominan warna baby pink.



Foto: Instagram @zapangi_official2. Zapangi sangat unik karena konsep tersembunyi di belakang mesin minuman, kafe ini menjual berbagai macam dessert yang lucu dan penuh warna.



Foto: Instagram @laundrypizza3. Kafe satu ini khusus menjual pizza, kafe satu ini sangat populer karena desain nya yang lucu dengan adanya mesin cuci seperti di laundry, oh ya kafe ini juga sudah sering dijadikan lokasi syuting video klip idol Korea lho!



Foto: Instagram @stk_official.jp4. Kakao friends yang terkenal di Korea juga membuka kafe lucu dengan karakter utama Ryan sebagai konsep dari kafeÂ yang bernama Ryan Cafe ini, gemas sekali!



Foto: Instagram @thanks_nature_cafe5. Kafe bertema kucing sudah menjamur, namun kafe ini berani beda dengan bertemakan domba. Anda bisa menyantap hidangan sambil bermain dengan 2 domba lucu.



Foto: Instagram @__n.2k6. Selain punya toko yang menjual merchadise official dari karakter lucu Line Friends, toko merchandise ini juga punya kafe yang lucu lho! Dengan karakter Line Friends dan BT21 yang sangat menggemaskan.



Foto: Instagram @greemcafe7. Kafe ini cukup unik karena bertemakan kartun dan terinspirasi dari drama korea W, Anda akan serasa di dalam dunia kartun jika berasa di kafe bernama Greem Cafe (2D Cafe) yang unik ini.



Foto: Instagram @itceekim8. Lucu namun sedikit menjijikan, kafe ini bertemakan kotoran manusia. Namun tak perlu khawatir karena kafe ini bersih tak seperti namanya Seoul Poop Cafe.



Foto: Instagram @c.trough9. Jika suka lukisan, kafe yang bernama C Trough ini menjual latte art ini harus jadi destinasi Anda ketika sedang berada di Seoul. Kafe ini membuat coffee latte dengan tema lukisan yang artsy dan lucu.



Foto: Instagram @appleorangez10. Satu lagi kafe bergaya artsy bernama Peach Grey yang berlokasi di Seoul dengan menyajikan hidangan manis sambil menaruh kuah dan cat warna untuk melukis, dekorasi kafe ini juga penuh dengan suasana yang artsy.
text:
Photo Gallery
Funny to Artsy, Seoul Has Many Cafes to Be Visited
05 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Instagram - detikFood
Jakarta - In Seoul there are many cafes that must be visited because they have a variety of themes ranging from cute adorable to artsy-themed cafes.


Photo: Instagram @ pinkpoolcafe1. This cafe is very popular because it is part of the Nanda Style boutique, has a concept with the theme of the cute cafe swimming pool area is very beautiful and instagenic with a dominant baby pink color.



Photo: Instagram @ zapangi_official2. Zapangi is very unique because the concept is hidden behind the beverage machine, this cafe sells a variety of cute and colorful desserts.



Photo: Instagram @ laundrypizza3. This cafe specializes in selling pizza, this cafe is very popular because of its cute design with a washing machine like laundry, oh yes this cafe has also often been used as a location for shooting Korean idol video clips, you know!



Photo: Instagram @ stk_official.jp4. Kakao friends who are famous in Korea also opened a cute cafe with the main character Ryan as the concept of this cafe called Ryan Cafe, how annoying!



Photo: Instagram @ thanks_nature_cafe5. The cat-themed cafe has mushroomed, but this cafe dares to be different from a sheep-themed one. You can eat a meal while playing with 2 cute sheep.



Photo: Instagram @__ n.2k6. Besides having a shop that sells official merchandise from the cute character of Line Friends, this merchandise store also has a cute cafe, you know! With Line Friends and BT21 characters that are very adorable.



Photo: Instagram @ greemcafe7. This cafe is quite unique because it has a cartoon theme and is inspired by Korean drama W, you will feel in the world of cartoons if you taste in this unique cafe called Greem Cafe (2D Cafe).



Photo: Instagram @ itceekim8. Funny but a little disgusting, this cafe is themed with human waste. But no need to worry because this cafe is clean unlike its name Seoul Poop Cafe.



Photo: Instagram @ c.trough9. If you like painting, this cafe called C Trough sells latte art. This should be your destination when you're in Seoul. This cafe makes coffee latte with a theme that is artsy and funny.



Photo: Instagram @ appleorangez10. Another artsy style cafe called Peach Gray located in Seoul serving sweet dishes while putting sauce and paint colors to paint, the cafe's decor is also full of an artsy atmosphere.
